name: sedata
description: Get security data(China market only for now)

scripts.cup: coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'minor updat' & cd .. & npm publish sedata
scripts.cupminor: verion minor & coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'minor updat' & cd .. & npm publish sedata
scripts.cupmajor: verion major & coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'minor updat' & cd .. & npm publish sedata
scripts.cuppatch: verion patch & coffee -bcmo lib/ src/ & git commit -am 'minor updat' & cd .. & npm publish sedata

author: Jigme Ko <jigme1968@gmail.com>
